Class FerromagneticLayer

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.apps.physics.spintronics.FerromagneticLayer
public class FerromagneticLayer extends Object
Represents a ferromagnetic layer with 3D magnetization vector.

Implements the macrospin approximation where the entire layer is treated as a single magnetic moment. This is valid for dimensions smaller than the exchange length (~5-10 nm for Permalloy).

See Also:
  • Žutić, I., et al. Spintronics: Fundamentals and applications. Rev. Mod. Phys. 77, 1375 (2005)

    • calculateEffectiveField

      public Real[] calculateEffectiveField()
      Calculates the effective magnetic field (A/m) for this layer. Includes Anisotropy (In-plane or Perpendicular) and Demagnetization.
